metadata.title: The Epicurean
metadata.author: Charles Ranhofer
metadata.note: Complete digital archive of The Epicurean (1894) by Charles Ranhofer. 3,186 recipes. Titles verified against original 1894 book text. Body text OCR-corrected across six systematic passes.
